sentences.sentence: The value of Britain and India decrease between 2010 and 2015.
There is an unusual rise in 2012 of Britain.
The value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014 and 2015 in India is greatly lower Britain.

There is an unusual rise in 2012 of Britain.
